src:
Cутки ООС: 13 обстрелов, потерь нет

02 Nov 2019

1 ноября, вооруженные формирования Российской Федерации и ее наемники 13 раз нарушили режим прекращения огня.
Как сообщает пресс-центр штаба ООС, противник обстреливал позиции подразделений Объединенных сил из запрещенных минского договоренностями минометов калибра 120 мм, а также гранатометов различных систем, крупнокалиберных пулеметов и другого стрелкового оружия.
В районе ответственности оперативно-тактической группировки "Восток" противник совершил 7 обстрелов.
В районе ответственности оперативно-тактической группировки "Север" противник совершил 6 обстрелов.
Потерь в результате обстрелов среди военнослужащих Объединенных сил не было.
С начала этого периода вооруженные формирования Российской Федерации и ее наемники огневой активности не проявляли. Потерь среди личного состава Объединенных сил не зафиксировано.
text:
For you it was a party
02 Nov 2019 by Violeta Marcovich
With the audience standing, all the artists on stage and with the compassion of Villa Paula setting the pace, the concert Por vos 2019, the solidarity show of the All or Nothing program of Radio Sarmiento, which last night took the stage in the Hall ended Palmares in Chimbas. Before more than 700 people, the 30 artists who were part of this edition, -which will have a second function on December 1 at the Municipal Theater of Albardón- delivered a solid concert, of great musical quality, which explored almost all genres with privileged voices.
With the conduction of Gabriela Moreno and Victoria Olaechea, the show was moving as if in blocks and from the stalls, premiering uniform, the boys who from the future orchestra of the Pestalozzi school, beneficiary of the show, followed everything carefully.
The albardonero Nicolás Olivieri was in charge of breaking the ice with A pact to live. Juanse Arano was the voice for a Cuyana harvester transformed into electronic tango. What followed next was a demonstration of female vocal power. Carla Tello became a sweet Sanjuanina and Mara Díaz showed her nuances in And give my heart joy. Carlota De Belulategui became very rocker doing Thinking about nothing and Florencia Poblete shone in a tango version of Afternoon fusion. Then, with El témpano, Martina Flores, with her unmistakable style, made a powerful version of Juan Carlos Baglietto's theme.
Then, Aldo Zaragoza put his passion to an original The Angel of the Bicycle. Pablo, Melisa and Leonardo Quiroga brought back the scene of Raúl de la Torre's waltz, to which Caribbean airs were put and which the public accompanied. Leo Jorquera, musician from the host department, delivered an effusive version of The Zonda has already been blowing, where three members of the chimbera troupe joined drummers. Claudio and Noemí Videla were encouraged to leave the tune for a while, putting the voice for a Tuyo always by Andrés Calamaro very tropical. The powerful band of this Por vos was again led by Lucio Flores, along with Josué Astorga, Emiliano Sánchez, Cristian Jorquera and Jorge Cordero
This was the end, as we anticipated, with Carnival throughout life, with all the singers on stage and the color of the chimney carnival that joined by the Rhythm to close a night full of emotions and with the satisfaction of the task accomplished.


Powerful. Martina Flores was one of the female voices.



Siblings. Melisa, Leonardo and Pablo Quiroga doing Romance of my childhood.



At home. The chimney Leo Jorquera had a great performance.



Authorities of DIARIO DE CUYO with the governor Sergio Uñac. From left to der. Lucrecia Silvestri, Francisco Montes, Gabriela Gil, Andrés Montes and the first president.
